name: Dark Forest
description: A mysterious forest area with dangerous creatures

5,0.title: Forest Entrance
5,0.description: The edge of a dark, mysterious forest. Ancient trees tower overhead, their branches creating a canopy that blocks much of the sunlight. Strange sounds echo from within the depths.

5,3.title: Deep Forest
5,3.description: You are deep within the forest. The trees are ancient and gnarled, their branches intertwining overhead to block out most sunlight. The air is thick with the scent of moss and decay.

6,3.title: Forest Clearing
6,3.description: A small clearing in the forest where sunlight filters through. Wildflowers grow here, and you can hear birds singing overhead.
